Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is very worn but traces of five lines of Coptic text written in black ink remain.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393326) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393326)
